foaf:Person.sql:sqlx: select xmlelement ('http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#:seeAlso', xmlattributes ( 'http://'|| WA_GET_HOST ()|| '/dataspace/'||wa_identity_dstype(u_name)||'/'|| u_name || '/foaf.rdf' as 'http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#:resource')) from sn_person, sys_users, WA_USER_INFO where sne_org_id = u_id and u_id = WAUI_U_ID and sne_id = :sne
